channel.title: The Game Server Development UPDATED!
channel.description:
Latest Update: Spent about an hour last night getting all the doors in Falador working(Excluding WhiteKnight castle) and placing all the npcs except quest ones. Spent long time on RsBot getting all locations etc.
Hey guys this is my latest server.
I have not even started with client yet so dont make comments on it please.
This server is based on Devo 2.7.
I have fixed a tonne of bugs. (Hard to take pics of those)
My aim: Every npc that has a talk option will talk. All the shops are going to be in their correct places. (E.g sheild shop in Falador)
Currently I have done: Varrock 100% like Rune-scape minus quest npcs AND every npc that can talk talks. Al-Kharid 100% like Rune-scape minus quest npcs AND every single door/curtain opens and closes AND every npc that can talk talks. My home city every npc talks. Every door works. Falador is a partially done all the npcs that can talk do talk. Sewer training in varrock is ish. Made friends list work and fixed lots of other bugs.(Including freezing bug) My biggest acheivment got modern auto casting to work and Npcs to use more than one attack style (This is using Devo 2.7 npc combat which is completely custom made by Killamess) Oh and also some npcs say random things each time (Thanks Java tutorials teaching me about random strings :)) Currently there are over 40 npc dialogues General stores sell for twice the price and buy for half the price :) Made multiZones work for npcs as well as humans
All the npcs that have a shopping option you can trade with and have correct runescape items except I go all the way to rune rather than just adamant or mithril.
Things I would like your help with if anyone is interested (I will update this): What should Dragons drop? Meaning Red Blue Green Black KBD. If you supply an item please supply the id as well (I am lazy)
Now for some pics:(Yes there are a truck load :)) [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/The%20Game/Fubergen0000.png[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/The%20Game/Fubergen0001.png[/img] [IMG]http://i368.photobucket.com/albums/oo123/tatemo/The%20Game/Fubergen0002.png[/img] I know its because of the client… -.- read before you post. That is actually a black chain. (I said that in response to the first post)
[/quote]It’s clearly the client, but didn’t you notice it before you uploaded your image you retarded prick face dog.

Yes I did, so what? That’s not the client I am using I just wanted the screen shot function. I am actually using the client Cj is making so hah.
[/quote]I’m hoping the see this finished, but then again no1 never finishes best of luck mate.[/quote]

wow kid gtfo like really is that al you do is flame its just a bandos chest its not like it will kill the server and also i am sure this is the development section well one of them and its in development so what servers will always have something that needs to be fix there’s really no reason for you to jump all over him about 1 picture and the looks of your server doesn’t look the greatest either

item.title: The Game Server Development UPDATED!
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

ChaosPkers:

This looks like a ton of fun, great ideas too Good luck with it

Thanks.
The most fun is in the coding. I love making dialogues and putting the npcs in its just so cool (Can’t say I am a big fan of doing bug fixes the Auto casting took a good 2 hours of putting printlns after every line of code in each void until I found where the problems were (Which there were numerous of) Ancients autocasting still doesn’t work)

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:7, topic:298600”]Hi Tate.

I unfucked my client, so we can use it again if you want?

I’ll do some model preloading aswell if you want.[/quote]

YAY! That’s good news. I am a bit busy with my speech right now but I will start on this again soon.

pk3r john:

Nice, are you planning of releasing this?

I am hoping to host this because I love the donations :)[quote=“jmood128, post:9, topic:298600”]nice job so far tate

green dragons drop- Dragon Bones (534), coins (995, like 1-5k i think), Green Hides (i think 1099)

i think that’s it i haven’t been a member for a year :P[/quote]

I don’t want the real drops but urs are appreciated. I have made all the dragons drop dragon bones and quite a significant amount of cash (1 in 40 chance) but I do have to remember to add the hides as they are very important thanks for reminding me.(Because Crafting is proper you know :))

Read full topic
